text: National Highway 135A, commonly referred to as NH 135A is a national highway in India. It is a secondary route of National Highway 35. NH-135A runs in the state of Uttar Pradesh in India. == Route == NH135A connects Mirzapur-Aura, Bhadohi- Jaunpur. And Varanasi-Sindhora-Kerakat-Jaunpur-Shahganj-Akbarpur -Ayodhya in the state of Uttar Pradesh. == Junctions == : Terminal near Mirzapur. : near Aurai : near Bhadohi : near Jaunpur : near Akbarpur : Terminal near Ayodhya. == See also == * List of National Highways in India * List of National Highways in India by state == References == == External links == * NH 135A on OpenStreetMap Category:National highways in India Category:National Highways in Uttar Pradesh
title: National Highway 135A (India)
